verses.verse: Deliver <WH2502> me, <WH3068> Yahweh, from the evil <WH7451> man. <WH120> Preserve <WH5341> me from the violent <WH2555> man; <WH376>
those who devise <WH2803> mischief <WH7451> in their hearts. <WH3820> They continually <WH3117> gather themselves together <WH1481> for war. <WH4421>
They have sharpened <WH8150> their tongues <WH3956> like a serpent. <WH5175> Viper <WH5919>'s poison <WH2534> is under their lips. <WH8193> Selah. <WH5542>

Yahweh, <WH3068> keep <WH8104> me from the hands <WH3027> of the wicked. <WH7563> Preserve <WH5341> me from the violent <WH2555> men <WH376> who have determined <WH2803> to trip <WH1760> my feet. <WH6471>

The proud <WH1343> have hidden <WH2934> a snare <WH6341> for me, <WH6566> they have spread the cords <WH2256> of a net <WH7568> by the path. <WH3027> They have set <WH7896> traps <WH4170> for me. <WH5542> Selah.
I said <WH559> to Yahweh, <WH3068> "You are my God. <WH410>" Listen <WH238> to the cry <WH6963> of my petitions, <WH8469> Yahweh. <WH3068>
Yahweh, <WH136> the Lord, <WH136> the strength <WH5797> of my salvation, <WH3444> you have covered <WH5526> my head <WH7218> in the day <WH3117> of battle. <WH5402>
Yahweh, <WH3068> don't <WH5414> grant the desires <WH3970> of the wicked. <WH7563> Don't <WH7563> let their evil plans <WH2162> succeed, <WH7311> or they will become proud. Selah. <WH5542>
As for the head <WH7218> of those who surround <WH4524> me, <WH5999> let the mischief of their own lips <WH8193> cover them. <WH3680>
Let burning coals <WH1513> fall <WH4131> on them. <WH5307> Let them be thrown into the fire, <WH784> into miry pits, <WH4113> from where they never rise. <WH6965>
An evil speaker <WH376> won't <WH3559> be established in the earth. <WH776> Evil <WH7451> will hunt <WH6679> the violent <WH2555> man <WH376> to overthrow him. <WH4073>
I know <WH3045> that Yahweh <WH3068> will maintain <WH6213> the cause <WH1779> of the afflicted, <WH6041> and justice <WH4941> for the needy. <WH34>
Surely the righteous <WH6662> will give thanks <WH3034> to your name. <WH8034> The upright <WH3477> will dwell <WH3427> in your presence. <WH6440>
